setCoordinateSystem

public void setCoordinateSystem(CoordinateSystem coordinateSystem,
                                LocationConverter locationConverter)
                         throws AdaptorException
Converts location to the specified coordinateSystem using the specified locationConverter. Does nothing if location is null.

Parameters:
coordinateSystem - target coordinate system for location.
locationConverter - converter to use to convert current location into target coordinate system.
Throws:
AdaptorException
